title: The 211 Club
description: It's the late 80's and Wyatt gets caught in a small time drug deal that spirals into a 4 year prison term in Soledad State Prison--an experience that transforms him and alters his view of society and freedom and authority and pushes him completely over the line that separates the lawful from the lawless. Based on real events and real characters, The 211 Club is written in the tradition of Edward Bunker, famed convict-writer, actor and mentor of the author. The title is taken from the California Penal Code:CALIFORNIA PENAL CODE—TITLE 8CRIMES AGAINST THE PERSON, Part One, § 211§ 211, DefinitionROBBERY DEFINED:Robbery is the felonious taking of personal property in the possession of another, from his person or immediate presence, and against his will, accomplished by means of force or fear.
author: Peter McArdle
